scripts.dev-custom: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW=true SW_DEV=true vite --force
scripts.run-build-custom-sw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true vite build
scripts.test-custom-sw: nr run-build-custom-sw && SW=true vitest run && SW=true playwright test
scripts.test-generate-sw: nr run-build-sw && vitest run && playwright test
